# Peering
### state-sync
```python
9e4aba1835f3590da434558daa3b1baeddff41dc@rpc.empowere.max-node.xyz:35656
```

### addrbook
```python
curl -Ls https://snapshots.max-node.xyz/empower/addrbook.json > $HOME/.empowerd/config/addrbook.json
```
### genesis
```python
curl -Ls https://snapshots.max-node.xyz/empower/genesis.json > $HOME/.empowerd/config/genesis.json
```
